story_09_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
The city seems particularly bustling with
activity today.
story_09_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Now that you mention it...it does seem busier
than usual around here.
story_09_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
People must be getting anxious now that
the PML tournament matches are just over
the horizon.
story_09_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Anyway, I was hoping to go for a nice stroll
through town, since I’m here and all... Hm?
Is there something wrong, Rosa?
story_09_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
No. I just...I swear I recognize that girl over there
from somewhere... Is that...Iris?
Iris, is that you over there?!
story_09_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Rosa! I haven’t seen you in so long!
I’m so glad I finally ran into someone I
recognize here.
story_09_01000/2401_0401_0800_10:
Yeah! Iris is actually the Champion of
the Unova region, you know!
story_09_01000/2401_0402_1000_10:
Yeah! We became friends through Pokémon
battling back in the Unova region. Iris is the
Champion there, you know!
story_09_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Oh! I should introduce you two! Iris, this is
my team leader, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_09_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Team leader? Ohhh, you’re all competing in
the PML together? That’s great! I’ve been
hearing a lot about it.
story_09_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I’m Iris!
Nice to meet you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_09_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
I never thought I’d run into you here,
but I’m sooo glad I did!
story_09_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Me too! I feel so much better now that I know
you’re here! Until now, I hadn’t found anyone
here that I recogni—
story_09_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Team Break must be causing trouble again!
Come on! We should go help!
story_09_01000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Right! I’ll go with you!
Is that OK, Rosa? [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
